class.name: Separator
class.description: Abstract base class for separators, used for separating other controls. [Separator]s are purely visual and normally drawn as a [StyleBoxLine].

theme_items.theme_item: The size of the area covered by the separator. Effectively works like a minimum width/height.
The style for the separator line. Works best with [StyleBoxLine] (remember to enable [member StyleBoxLine.vertical] for [VSeparator]).
